en.name: English
en.subtitle: 60-Language Code Editor & Developer Journal
en.description:
MarkCraft is the IDE that transforms coding into a creative act. Write, annotate, record, and reflect â€” all in one poetic environment.

FEATURES:
â€¢ 60-Language Syntax Highlighting â€” From Swift to Zig, every language gets first-class treatment
â€¢ Developer Journal â€” Track your coding journey with streaks, mood tracking, and flashcards
â€¢ Ink Annotations â€” Draw directly on your code with Apple Pencil support
â€¢ Audio Recording â€” Record voice notes synced to your code changes
â€¢ AI Chat Assistant â€” Get intelligent help powered by Claude
â€¢ Terminal Emulator â€” Run code in 29 languages without leaving the app
â€¢ PDF Book Export â€” Turn your journal into a beautiful printed book
â€¢ 39 UI Languages â€” Fully localized interface for global developers
â€¢ Mini Game Engine â€” Built-in ECS game engine demo in pure SwiftUI
â€¢ Pomodoro Timer â€” Stay focused with built-in productivity tools

DESIGNED FOR APPLE:
â€¢ 100% Native SwiftUI â€” No web views, no compromises
â€¢ macOS 14.0+ optimized â€” Full keyboard shortcuts, split view, focus mode
â€¢ Dark & Light themes â€” Carefully crafted obsidian palette
â€¢ Privacy First â€” All data stays on your device

MarkCraft V150 â€” Where code meets the soul.
en.promo: The IDE that transforms coding into a creative act.
en.whats_new: V150: Complete rebuild with 41 clean files, 60 languages, ECS game engine, terminal emulator, and zero compilation issues.
